question: What is the name of the app launched by Vodafone Idea and Nasscom Foundation for women safety?
explanation:
Vodafone Idea and Nasscom Foundation has launched an app named “My Ambar” (meaning my sky). It is an app-based solution for women safety in India. It has been developed under the ‘Connecting for Good program’.
The app aims to help women understand and raise their voice against violence. The app is available in English and Hindi. It is provided with easy access to key helpline numbers and service providers across the country.
